title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: July 28, 2022, 10:48:08 PMLast edit: August 01, 2022, 10:15:42 PM by ZipReg
content: Greeting Everyone! I hope you're all doing well! Today we have a piece from my first release, BTC To The Future! v1.0 #054.2018 BTC To The Future! v1.0 Limited Edition Series #054 of 100Tickets:1 - Steeley2 - Dernoste3 - Mbitr4 - tread935 - Markzellers6 - haloxon7 - Dernoste8 - Liquidoptions9 - Remsjack0 - tweetiousa - Dernosteb - bitcoiner24hc - xSlyyd - DirtyBirdEe - aoluain f - bitbolloGeneral Info: Price Per Ticket: 1 FREE SPOT PER PERSON - Courtesy of DernosteTicket Limit: No limit, take them all if you'd like. Shipping: INCLUDED!! Any Import/VAT taxes paid by winner.How To Play:Pick one or more of the available Tickets slots from the table above. PM or post a reply with your pick(s) + the txID of your transaction. Once all Tickets are taken (and paid for) we'll select a future BTC block number. The last character in the hash of that block will decide the winner! Thank You & Good Luck!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: bitcoiner24h bought 5 spots in the last free raffle courtesy of minerjones, so he has 5 spots to choose in this raffle.

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: bitcoiner24h on July 28, 2022, 11:18:55 PMb,c,d,e,fThanks  Yes Sir, you've got em' buddy   Thank you!Last you'll see of these for a while guys, did not plan on letting this one go

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: Dernoste on July 29, 2022, 03:22:36 AM7-2 DernostethxHey buddy   Yes Sir, all yours!

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Well I have some good news guys!The raffle had stalled and I issued a refund to bitcoiner24h and then Dernoste paid for all remaining spots and has asked me to give one to Liquidoptions, one to bitcoiner24h, and give the rest away!  One free spot per person courtesy of Dernoste!If you would like a free spot please select one before they are all gone!

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Great @Dernoste  fellow collector from Italy, well done  !!! I'll take f-bitbollo!

comments.author: DirtyBirdE
comments.body: Wow thanks Dernoste! And thank you ZipZeg for the raffle. I’ll try my luck with spot D

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: You're welcome everyone and good luck to you all  ONLY 5 SPOTS REMAINING!If you would like a free spot please select one before they are all gone!

comments.author: aoluain
comments.body: Can I avail of e - aoluain ?Wow that is very generous of Dernoste.

comments.body: #1 pleaseDenoste - thank you for the generosity!
